attributes.action: The right to own and carry taser guns and defence gas-spray for personal protection against crime and aggressive animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to own and carry a taser or stun gun or a defence gas-spray such as CS or pepper spray. It is legal in many European countries. It is for personal protection against rising streetcrime and attacks from aggressive animals. Its should be legal to own these but official registered and bound to a "mini" firearms license.
